description:
Hatch from your flower and spelunk through the beautiful and sometimes haunting world of ANIMAL WELL, a pixelated
action-exploration game rendered in intricate audio and visual detail. Encounter lively creatures small and large,
helpful and ominous as you discover unconventional upgrades and unravel the well’s secrets.

0.1.description:
The first release of the alpha version of the Animal Well Archipelago integration.
Apworld by Scipio, RoobyRoo, and GameWyrm primarily.
Client by Franklesby.

You probably need to use the 0.4.7 RC1. I have not tested it with 0.4.6. If it works with 0.4.6, please let us know and I can remove this note.

WARNING:
It's early alpha. The game came out like 3 weeks ago. The client works most of the time.

Known issues:
- The contents of chests will appear vanilla in-game. See the client to see what was actually in the chest.
- Filler items do not work. They are not implemented yet. You will need to use your imagination.
- The client rarely fails for no real reason when opening a chest. We do not know why yet. If it fails, please let us know in the discord and send your log file as well (in the Archipelago logs folder).
- Some yaml options are missing. This is intentional. They don't work yet.
- There are softlocks in logic. If you get stuck, you can type `/ring` into the client to get the Cheater's Ring, which lets you noclip. Please do not rely on this, it will likely be removed when we find a better way to get you out of a softlock.
- There is no poptracker. Use Universal Tracker instead, it will work.

Quick update: Updated the released apworld for better logging.
Second quick update: Updated the released apworld to fix a failure when you get a bnuyy.

Instructions:
Put the .apworld in your Archipelago/lib/worlds folder.

Generate a template yaml by opening the Archipelago Launcher and click on Generate Template Options.

Customize your Animal Well yaml, put it in your Players folder.

Run Generate from the Launcher. Host locally or upload it at the Archipelago uploads/host page.

Launch Animal Well. You must open the game before the client.

Open your load menu, and load into an empty save file. Do not load into a save file with progress on it.

Now, open up the Animal Well client. It will search for the start address of your Animal Well game. This will take anywhere from a few seconds to a few minutes. Usually, it takes around 20 seconds. If it fails, restart both the game and the client.

When it succeeds, you'll be able to connect to your Archipelago room. If it connects, you should be good to go.
0.1.title: Animal Well v0.1 - Alpha First Release

0.1.1.description:
Updates to logging, client connects much faster than before.

Making this one a new release because it's been like a day since the last one so yeah.

For setup instructions, see the [setup guide](https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/blob/animal-well/worlds/animal_well/docs/setup_en.md), or look at the previous release.

Known issues:
- whatever is in the previous release notes
- K Shards from chests don't work. You will have to get them from the kangaroo. The logic is adjusted to account for this.
0.1.1.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.1.1

0.1.2.description:
Targeted the proper branch, so the "what's changed" is just everything so far.

Stability fixes, logic fixes, client fixes, all that kind of fun stuff.

K. Shards still are tied to the actual kangaroo -- the item you receive does nothing currently. It will likely work in the next version, though.


## What's Changed
* Update options.py to remove reference to Egg Song by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/10
* Standardized regions for fish areas by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/11
* Add some additional items and events to item_names.py by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/12
* cleared some to-dos and clarified some comments by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/14
* Adjusted Location Names file by @GameWyrm in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/13
* First pass at item table by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/15
* more logical considerations by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/16
* A couple of new frog chests + weird ball shenanigans by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/18
* Fleshing out locations.py + organization of items, locations, item_names.py, location_names.py by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/19
* More wheel logic and some other terrible things by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/21
* Knocked out several todos and found more cursed ball logic by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/23
* better support for starting area ghost by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/24
* WIP: Client Implementation by @Frank-Pasqualini in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/22
* Animal well by @Frank-Pasqualini in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/25
* Launcher in apworld by @Frank-Pasqualini in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/26
* Better error logging by @Frank-Pasqualini in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/27
* Much faster process searching (plus map stuff) by @Frank-Pasqualini in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/28
* Client Stability and filler items by @Frank-Pasqualini in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/29

## New Contributors
* @Rooby-Roo made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/10
* @GameWyrm made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/13
* @Frank-Pasqualini made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/22

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.1...0.1.2
0.1.2.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.1.2

0.2.0.description:
Hey look, 0.2.0, that's significant, right?

The client works better, more bugs squashed, k shards can drop from chests now.

## What's Changed

Individual keys option works now, golden egg chest works, and candles as checks is a usable option now.
Also misc bug fixes, logic fixes, etc.

0.2.1.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.2.1

0.2.2.description:
Removed 0.5.0 helpers so that it can be genned with 0.4.6.

Otherwise, just various misc fixes. Also the skulls to the B.B. Wand will always be at 37 skulls, making the minimal staircase needed to get there.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.2.1...0.2.2

More logic bug fixes, and fixed the S Medal door closing behind you.

0.2.4.description:
Couple logic additions/fixes, but mostly it's just a little client refactor.
Does not have the search speedup yet.

## What's Changed

0.2.4.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.2.4

0.2.6-hotfix2.description:
Fixed a bug with some None-type issues. Previous release removed, release notes from the previous one below.


Thanks to @dicene, it now connects really quickly! At least until the game updates next.
Also, the filler items are now much more generous, but also don't re-give you them on every connect.
And otherwise, just more logic bugfixes. Thank you to @Rooby-Roo and everyone who reported logic bugs.
Thanks to @voidlily for fixing a dumb bug I added.

## What's Changed
* Discord logic requests as of 6/19 by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/38
* Fixed barcode bunny access by office by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/39
* Added a new pointer-based approach for finding base memory location by @dicene in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/40
* Make it so you don't re-get filler on reconnect by @ScipioWright in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/41
* animal_well: Bounds check berries and firecrackers by @voidlily in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/42

## New Contributors
* @dicene made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/40
* @voidlily made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/42

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.2.5...0.2.6-hotfix2
0.2.6-hotfix2.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.2.6 - hotfix2

New Advanced Wheel logic from Rooby -- basically implements wheel climbs into logic (with the option on) and an option for more advanced wheel tricks.
Otherwise, mostly fixes.

## What's Changed

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.2.6...0.2.7
0.2.7.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.2.7

0.2.8.description:
Fixed a bug where you would goal if you reconnected if you had Egg Hunt goal enabled and you got your House Key check previously.
Also some logic changes/fixes.

0.2.8.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.2.8

0.3.0.description:
Lots of cool enhancements thanks to @dicene, most notable are that the game will now display the items you send and receive in the upper left corner, and there is a Warp to Hub option to help escape soft locks.

## What's Changed
* Animal Well: Add patching in game text display, in-game state check, other enhancements by @dicene in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/46


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.2.8...0.3.0
0.3.0.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.3.0

0.3.1.description:
And here comes Dregu, fixing a couple of longstanding issues:
- When you hit the fireworks plunger, it skips the credits, giving you the key location (and the goal complete if that's your goal) immediately
- When you have the mock disc, it actually shows up in your inventory, and the chest it came in stays open

## What's Changed
* Lots of pep8 cleanup by @ScipioWright in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/49
* Discord logic updates as of 8/14 by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/51
* ANIMAL WELL: Fix Mock Disc inventory and chest, add patch to skip credits by @Dregu in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/50

## New Contributors
* @Dregu made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/50

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.3.0...0.3.1
0.3.1.title: Animal Well Alpha v0.3.1

0.4.0.description:
Gonna just call this beta now, just because. Still some missing features, but those will come over time.

Go look at the what's changed below! Look at all those contributors! Love them! Worship them!

Main things here: There's now an in-game tracker thanks to Dregu.
You can toggle it with the `/tracker` command in the client, or you can modify it in your host.yaml.
Death link is here too, and the version number on the title screen, and some misc logic stuff.

## What's Changed
* various updates for client/component by @qwint in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/52
* Animal well logic tracker by @ScipioWright in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/53
* Patch Mock Disc chest flags check, patch firecracker pickup dialog, small QoL fixes by @Dregu in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/57
* Animal Well: Update title screen display to reflect the Animal Well APWorld version number by @dicene in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/59
* Animal Well: Deathlink foundations by @dicene in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/56
* ANIMAL WELL: Ingame tracker by @Dregu in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/54

## New Contributors
* @qwint made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/52

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.3.1...0.4.0
0.4.0.title: Animal Well Beta v0.4.0

0.4.1.description:
New in-game console, press ` to use it.
Fixed filler items not working.
Save files are now based on your seed, so there is no longer a need to worry about accidentally loading an old save. Because you can't.

## What's Changed
* Disable k.shard sack spawns, tracker optimization by @Dregu in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/61
* ANIMAL WELL: Ingame console by @Dregu in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/58
* Seeded save files by @Dregu in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/62


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.4.0...0.4.1
0.4.1.title: Animal Well Beta v0.4.1

0.4.2.description:
NOTE: Does not work on the current patch as of October 22nd. You will have to downpatch or wait until we've fixed the issue.

NOTE 2: See the discord pins for a test build that probably works. Once it's been tested enough, we'll publish a new release.

Main thing here: the weird tricks option has been factored out into lots of different trick options thanks to RoobyRoo! Check 'em out, happy ball throwing!

## What's Changed
* Factor out weird_tricks, take two by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/64


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.4.1...0.4.2
0.4.2.title: Animal Well Beta v0.4.2

0.5.0.description:
A bunch of stuff is NOT broken. Also there were a ton of PRs in the meantime which definitely didn't help with getting this release out more quickly!
Main things:
- Fruitsanity by @LeapFroggle -- all fruit becomes a check!
- Flute jump logic by @Zannick -- slip off a ledge with the flute out and retain some very very longterm coyote time.
- Fixing literally everything by @dicene -- definitely the most important one here
- Making the main tab not get spammed anymore by @qwint
- Song command by @qwint so you can see the song names in the client
- The rest is fairly misc, you can read up on them below if you want

## What's Changed
* Animal Well: Add Fruitsanity by @LeapFroggle in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/65
* Add flute jumps to logic as obscure tricks by @Zannick in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/70
* Switch from using module offsets to AoB patterns by @dicene in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/72
* moves patcher-type log messages to a new beanlogger tab by @qwint in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/68
* adds ap url handling to animal well component by @qwint in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/67
* Simplify convert_tech_reqs by @Zannick in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/73
* Animal Well Bugfix: Add error handling to tick function, fix crashing on death by @dicene in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/74
* Candles: some locations are not candles by @Zannick in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/75
* Animal Well: Improve the display of hints in-game by @dicene in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/76
* Add song command (with numpad notation) by @qwint in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/77

## New Contributors
* @LeapFroggle made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/65
* @Zannick made their first contribution in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/70

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.4.2...0.5.0

0.5.2.description:
"Hey, what happened to 0.5.1?"
I'm not giving it the same version number as the current AP version, that's just a great way to cause confusion.

Anyway, smaller update. Some logic fixes by @Rooby-Roo. Forcing the client to crash if you close the game while the client is open, since someone did that and it auto-released some checks, so we just don't want that to happen ever again. And it's unrecoverable when you do that anyway soooo might as well!

## What's Changed
* Discord logic updates as of 12/20/24 by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/78


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.5.0...0.5.2
0.5.2.title: Animal Well Beta v0.5.2

0.5.3.description:
@dicene added a client option to pacify or disable the ghost dog. Type `/help` in the client for more information.
Some version of Archipelago, like the 0.6.2 RC, do not have a specific windows dependency that we need for the in-game text input field, so that will not function on those versions. It should still function if that dependency is in the frozen build of Archipelago that you have installed.
Otherwise, mostly a bunch of bug fixes.

## What's Changed
* revise wheel trick difficulty for sweet egg chest by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/79
* Some doc revisions. by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/80
* Make UV lantern useful on exclude tedious bunnies by @qwint in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/81
* Fix candle counts in tracker display by @ScipioWright in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/83
* Animal Well: Add options to pacify or disable ghost dog by @dicene in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/82
* fix connection from dog upper > center well by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/84
* doc revisions by @LeapFroggle in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/86
* additional bear middle phone + match spot connections by @Rooby-Roo in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/87
* Make text gui an optional import by @ScipioWright in https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/pull/88


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ScipioWright/Archipelago-SW/compare/0.5.2...0.5.3
0.5.3.title: Animal Well Beta v0.5.3
